metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15531 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: GNU Libextractor through 1.9 has a heap-based buffer over-read in the function EXTRACTOR_dvi_extract_method in plugins/dvi_extractor.c. It was discovered that Libextractor incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libextractor package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.9-2').
